attributes.title: Jodan
attributes.season: ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series''

sections.Biography:
==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
[[Croft]] orders Jodan to bring some of [[Daenerys Targaryen]]'s best wine when he meets with [[Asher Forrester]], [[Beskha]] and [[Malcolm Branfield]] outside [[Meereen]].<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
